Despite financial constraints and guardianship, we managed to create conditions for the protection of the weaker social strata.
In adverse conditions, we managed to close the first and most difficult assessment, to stabilize the economy, 1/2
which is now on track to recover and at the same time have the smallest possible social wounds. 2/2
We are now going through a new period. The recovery of the economy will enable us to distribute the benefits fairly. # Fair_Expanding
In recent months, we have very positive indications of the course of the economy. The third quarter of 2016 ended in positive rhythms
Unemployment remains unacceptably high, but it is declining. During our government service it has dropped by 4%.
Our great national goal must be to regain work in our homeland. To reach the European average by 2021.
Only the protection of labor can be the basis for the long-term and solid foundation of the Greek economy.
I'm trying to make a lucid campaign and do what the French are asking for. #DimPol #ToutPourLaFrance https://t.co/zP94Yzocms
The malaise of democracy comes from a single thought that forbids talking about certain problems and presenting solutions. #DimPol
The deal will go ahead and close on time. So at Eurogroup on 5 December we can make positive decisions.
I want to put my experience of my successes and my failures in the service of France. #DimPol #ToutPourLaFrance
That is, to open the debate on the specific measures in the short, medium and long term for the reduction of Greek debt.
My mistake: giving too much importance to the circumstances of the moment. I will have to go further and faster. #DimPol #ToutPourLaFrance
There is a need for strong alternation. #DimPol #ToutPourLaFrance
This is a fair goal that the overwhelming majority of the European and international community is now recognizing.
After 5 years of Mr Holland, it takes a President who decides. There are decisions to make, whether popular or not. #DimPol
A president without a strong majority can not do anything. #DimPol #ToutPourLaFrance
We can not make a government contract with a political force that is not completely committed to our side. #DimPol
I think this is the point of the upcoming visit of US President Barack Obama - a historic event in every respect.
In 1 year our country visited Pr. Putin, Pr. Holland, Pr. Yigger, the leaders of the 7 Mediterranean EU countries 1/2
I love my country more than all. I can not support the idea of ​​downgrading France. #DimPol #ToutPourLaFrance
Pope Francis with Patriarch Bartholomew and now President Obama. Greece is again claiming the role it deserves in the region. 2/2
This government will never be tolerated by the old and bankrupt system of power. 1/2
The war we have accepted and will continue to accept on all fronts will be merciless. 2/2
The struggle to regulate the television landscape was & is an episode of this ongoing war. We will not retreat.
Nobody claims that no contest must be made - no - I hope - does not claim that there should be no price for the licenses.
The NJ has no excuse for not complying with its constitutional obligation. It must assist in the appointment of the ESR.
We state in all tones: We will continue to seek consensus on the ESR in order to proceed with the competition for licenses.
I think that France has a lot of dynamism, youth and strength and that we need major reforms. #DimPol
I will fight for the Republicans to have an absolute majority. I want a clear contract. #DimPol
I will ask the French about the administrative detention of the most dangerous S files in June 2017. #DimPol https://t.co/wjgYOHwF04
I wish to empower business leaders to prohibit any sign of religious proselytism. #DimPol #ToutPourLaFrance
Our central objective was and remains the exit from the crisis with society upright in order to put an end to the status of guardianship.
We are a secular country, we have a problem with a political Islam that tests the limits of the Republic. #DimPol #ToutPourLaFrance
